Original:
作為專業的菜鳥調酒師，我真誠地邀請您每晚8:00 來我們的酒吧參觀。您可以體驗不同於商業酒吧的酒吧文化！ 🍹

這裡的氣氛非常輕鬆，調酒師也能聊天、講笑話、表演魔術。即使是第一次約會，如果你們很喜歡對方，我們可以幫你營造氣氛（如果你不喜歡他/她，我們也可以做其他安排😉）

另一個好處是我有很多很酷的酒鬼朋友，他們每週五和週六都會來看我（有些是很好的舞者，甚至在店裡即興跳舞哈哈）。我將向大家介紹彼此。如果你一個人來，想認識新朋友聊天，有很多機會。 🥰

需要注意的是，這是一家複合餐廳，早上/下午/晚上供應健康餐點，酒吧晚上8點開門。

如果您查看此訊息並決定前來，請不要忘記告訴我。我通常週五週六晚上都會工作，讓我為你準備一個驚喜吧！

希望大家在 Vault 度過一個美好的夜晚和回憶！ 💕
EN:
As a professional rookie bartender, I sincerely invite you to visit our bar 8:00 every night.You can experience bar culture different from commercial bars!Bleak

The atmosphere here is very easy, and the bartender can also chat, tell jokes, and perform magic.Even for the first time, if you like each other very much, we can help you create an atmosphere (if you don't like him/her, we can do other arrangements)

Another advantage is that I have a lot of cool alcoholic friends. They come to see me every Friday and Saturday (some are good dancers, and even improvise in the store).I will introduce you to each other.If you come alone and want to meet new friends to chat, there are many opportunities.Bleak

It should be noted that this is a composite restaurant that supplys healthy meals in the morning/afternoon/evening, and the bar open the door at 8 pm.

If you look at this message and decide to come, don't forget to tell me.I usually work on Friday and Saturday, let me prepare a surprise for you!

I hope everyone will spend a beautiful night and memories on Vault!Bleak

Original: 友好的工作人員，公平的價格，良好的氛圍。我不能要求更多了。我強烈推薦它並且會再次訪問這家咖啡館
EN: Friendly staff, fair prices, good atmosphere.I can't ask more.I strongly recommend it and will visit this cafe again

Original:
貝蒂的精緻無酒精雞尾酒

我最近有幸參觀了貝蒂酒吧，這是一顆隱藏在市中心的寶石，我必須說它超出了我的所有期望。當我走進大門時，我感受到了這家迷人飯店的每個角落都洋溢著溫暖而誘人的氛圍。酒吧令人愉快的主人 Betty 以其卓越的服務和令人難忘的無酒精雞尾酒真正搶盡了風頭。

Betty's Bar 提供各種創新美味的無酒精雞尾酒，可滿足各種口味和喜好。每款飲品的呈現都對細節一絲不苟，很明顯，貝蒂對調酒學有著真正的熱情。一些出色的混合物包括熱情的薑汁汽水、清爽的漿果極樂和熱帶島嶼微風。每一口這些無酒精飲料都是絕對的享受，讓我渴望從他們令人印象深刻的菜單中嘗試更多。

貝蒂酒吧的氣氛同樣迷人。昏暗的燈光、舒適的座椅和不拘一格的裝飾營造出輕鬆而親密的氛圍，非常適合與朋友聚會或享受安靜的夜晚。背景音樂精心策劃，增加了整體體驗，但又不會讓人感到壓倒性的。

貝蒂熱情開朗的個性確實使她成為一個與眾不同的主人。她花時間與每位客人互動，提供個人化的建議，並確保每個人整個晚上都得到很好的照顧。她的熱情好客是無與倫比的，讓我們從到達那一刻直到訪問結束都感到賓至如歸。

總而言之，貝蒂酒吧為那些尋求舒適場所放鬆身心並品嚐精心調製的無酒精雞尾酒的人們提供了真正獨特且難忘的體驗。憑藉其迷人的氛圍和無可挑剔的服務，這家酒店很快就在我的城市必去酒吧名單中佔有一席之地。我全心全意地向任何想要在不喝酒的情況下享受美妙夜晚的人推薦貝蒂酒吧。祝貝蒂有個美好的夜晚！
EN:
Betty's exquisite alcoholic cocktail

I have been fortunate to visit the Betty Bar recently. This is a gem hidden in the city center. I must say that it exceeds all my expectations.When I walked into the door, I felt that every corner of the charming hotel was filled with a warm and seductive atmosphere.The bar's pleasant owner Betty really seized the limelight with its excellent service and unforgettable wineless cocktails.

Betty's Bar offers a variety of innovative and delicious alcohol -free cocktails, which can satisfy various flavors and preferences.The presentation of each drink is meticulous. Obviously, Betty has a real enthusiasm for alcoholics.Some excellent mixtures include enthusiastic ginger soda, refreshing berry bliss and tropical islands breeze.Every bite of these wine -free drinks is absolutely enjoyable, making me eager to try more from their impressive menu.

The atmosphere of Betty Bar is also charming.The dim lights, comfortable seats and eclectic decorations create a relaxed and intimate atmosphere, which is very suitable for meeting with friends or enjoying a quiet night.The background music carefully planned, adding an overall experience, but it will not make people feel overwhelming.

Betty's enthusiastic and cheerful personality really made her a unique master.She spent time interacting with each guest, providing personalized suggestions, and ensuring that everyone can be taken good care of them all night.Her enthusiastic hospitality is unparalleled, and let us feel like returning from that moment to the end of the visit.

All in all, Betty Bar provided a truly unique and unforgettable experience for those who seeks comfortable and elaborate cocktails who were seeking comfort and tasting carefully prepared.With its charming atmosphere and impeccable service, this hotel will soon have a place to go to the bar list in my city.I recommend Betty Bar to anyone who wants to enjoy a wonderful night without drinking a wonderful night.I wish Betty a wonderful night!

Original: 相當不錯的地方，食物和飲料的價格也很合理。只吃了他們的炸馬蘇里拉起司棒（150 美元），還不錯，但不知道他們的其他東西。還提供一些桌上遊戲，這很不錯。在我看來，音樂選擇非常出色，融合了不同的流派，但都適合酒吧和飲酒的氛圍。
EN: The price of food and beverages is also reasonable.They only ate their fried Marri -La cheese ($ 150), which was not bad, but I didn't know other things.It also provides some table games, which is very good.In my opinion, the choice of music is very good and combines different genres, but it is suitable for the atmosphere of bar and drinking.

Original: 裝飾和音樂不太合我的口味，但飲料很好。工作人員非常友好。我們要求不要塑膠吸管，結果給了一份有金屬吸管的飲料和一份沒有金屬吸管的飲料，這沒問題，但也許更多的金屬吸管會更好？一件有點令人反感的事情是有人在入口內的一張桌子上吃外面的外帶食物。這是一件非常台灣的事情，這……很棒……？但當我想到去一家不錯的酒吧喝一杯時，這種隨興的感覺就有點不協調了。我們喝了一杯莫吉托和一杯杜松子酒，兩者都很好。他們也有皮姆酒（是的）但我們沒有嘗試。
EN: Decoration and music do not fit my taste, but the drink is very good.The staff is very friendly.We asked not to be plastic straws. As a result, a drink with metal straws and a drink without metal straws. This is no problem, but maybe more metal straws will be better?A little disgusting is that someone eats outer food on a table on the entrance.This is a very Taiwanese thing, this ... is great ...?But when I thought of going to a good bar for a drink, this feeling of easy -going was a bit uncoordinated.We drank a glass of Mogito and a glass of Du Songzi wine. Both were very good.They also have Pim (yes) but we did not try.
